meanings.definition: A metal disc or piece bearing an inscription or design, made to commemorate an event or awarded as a distinction to someone such as a soldier, athlete, or scholar.
meanings.sent1: She proudly wore the shiny medal around her neck.
meanings.sent2: The soldier received a medal for his bravery in battle.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the medal was a shiny toy and batted it around.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a medal in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The medal gleamed like a tiny moon on his chest.

meanings.definition: To award a medal to someone.
meanings.sent1: The principal will medal the winners of the science fair.
meanings.sent2: They decided to medal the top three athletes in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that she would medal the student with the messiest desk.
meanings.sent4: In the end, they chose to medal the most improved player.
meanings.sent5: The coach will medal the team members who show exceptional sportsmanship.
